entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • BuildFromSource Windows Activate for VS #45119
  • SignalR should allow managing of connections by UserGroup #45114
    .NET 8 Planning
  • MAUI + Blazor | Navigating away / Breaking Circuit causes "generic JS exception" #45112
  • MAUI + Blazor | IOS Release throws on virtual Parameter setter #45111
  • net7: Razor class library - Missing CSS bundle in published package when built using msbuild /maxCpuCount #45108
  • Blazor server login form doesn't see values inputted by password manager #45106
    Backlog
  • Logs filled with critical exceptions from Kestrel/Quic #45105
  • Lazy loaded `BlazorCustomElements.js` file does not adhere to the `loadBootResource` configuration #45104
    Backlog
  • Results.Created returns a relative URI in the location header instead of an absolute (as in classic Web API) #45101
  • NET 6 Blazor WASM Hosted - Query diminishing performance #45100
  • Net 7.0 Connection processing ended abnormally. #45110
  • Asp.Net Core API controller memory leak #45098
    Discussions

Closed

  • HttpResponse Doesn't Allow Negative Value for Cookie Max-Age #45045
    8.0-preview1
  • Unable to configure HTTPS endpoint #45023
  • Blazor Webassembly is broken out of the box #44902
  • UsePathBase does not work as expected in .NET 6 #45076
  • Feature request: strongly-typed route values in `a` tag-helpers #35376
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Give support of writing typescript instead just JavaScript in inline script for .cshtml pages. Also allow to have inheritance there as code can be re-used in all pages. #45103
  • Can you reopen my issue 44088 ? #45107
  • @bind:after is not working #45050
  • Invoking endpoint filter but not handler on argument error causes VoidTaskResult to be written to the response body #45040
    8.0-preview1

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/3.1] Use simpler Docker tags #45118
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • [release/7.0] Endpoint filter pipeline now returns EmptyHttpResult in case of 400 BadRequest #45109
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Use restore.cmd to Restore the Project #45026
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Support max-age negative value #45099
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/7.0] Use simpler Docker tags #45115
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/6.0] Use simpler Docker tags #45117
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Update Microsoft.Build.* dependencies to 17.4 #45116
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Update 7.0 SiteExtension version #45113
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Fix SiteExtension loading on App Service #44987
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Endpoint filter pipeline now returns EmptyHttpResult in case of 400 BadRequest #45073
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Remove array allocation from multi-span header parsing #45044
    area-runtime, servers-kestrel
  • Support checking for required members in minimal APIs #45084
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2045941 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • Add OnPrepareResponseAsync #45062
    area-runtime, community-contribution
